verses.verse: Then <S%H935>came<s%> all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H559>spoke,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H6106>"Behold,<s%> we are your bone and your <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

In times <S%H865>past,<s%> when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3318>us,<s%> it was you who led out and brought <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7462>you,<s%> 'You shall be shepherd of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and you shall be <S%H5057>prince<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>'"

So all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron;<s%> and <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them in <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and they <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
<S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign,<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

In <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> over <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H2320>months;<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7970>thirty-three<s%> <S%H7969><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> against the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> who <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Unless you take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H5787>blind<s%> and the <S%H6455>lame,<s%> you shall not come <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H559>here;<s%>" thinking, <S%H1732>"David<s%> <S%H935>can't<s%> come in here."
Nevertheless <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H4686>stronghold<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> the same is the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> "Whoever <S%H5221>strikes<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> let him get <S%H5060>up<s%> to the <S%H6794>watercourse,<s%> and strike the <S%H6455>lame<s%> and the <S%H5787>blind,<s%> who are <S%H8130>hated<s%> by <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H5315>soul.<s%>" Therefore they <S%H559>say,<s%> "The <S%H5787>blind<s%> and the <S%H6455>lame<s%> <S%H935>can't<s%> come into the <S%H1004>house.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H4686>stronghold,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> it the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> from <S%H4407>Millo<s%> and <S%H1004>inward.<s%>
<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3212>grew<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> and <S%H1980>greater;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> was with him.

<S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> and <S%H2796>carpenters,<s%> and <S%H7023>masons;<s%> and they <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> a <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3045>perceived<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H3559>established<s%> him <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and that he had <S%H5375>exalted<s%> his <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> for his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>'s sake.

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him more <S%H6370>concubines<s%> and <S%H802>wives<s%> out of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he had <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H2275>Hebron;<s%> and there were yet <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H1732>David.<s%>

These are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of those who were <S%H3209>born<s%> to him in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> <S%H8051>Shammua,<s%> and <S%H7727>Shobab,<s%> and <S%H5416>Nathan,<s%> and <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%>
and <S%H2984>Ibhar,<s%> and <S%H474>Elishua,<s%> and <S%H5298>Nepheg,<s%> and <S%H3309>Japhia,<s%>
and <S%H476>Elishama,<s%> and <S%H450>Eliada,<s%> and <S%H467>Eliphelet.<s%>

When the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that they had <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> all the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H1732>David;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H3381>it,<s%> and went down to the <S%H4686>stronghold.<s%>
Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5203>spread<s%> themselves in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Shall I go <S%H5927>up<s%> against the <S%H6430>Philistines?<s%> Will you <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into my <S%H3027>hand?<s%>" <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> "Go <S%H5927>up;<s%> for I will <S%H5414>certainly<s%> <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to Baal <S%H1732>Perazim,<s%> and David <S%H5221>struck<s%> them <S%H559>there;<s%> and he said, <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6555>broken<s%> my <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6556>me,<s%> like the breach of <S%H4325>waters.<s%>" Therefore he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that place Baal <S%H4725>Perazim.<s%>
They <S%H5800>left<s%> their <S%H6091>images<s%> <S%H1732>there;<s%> and David and his <S%H582>men<s%> took them <S%H5375>away.<s%>
The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> yet <S%H3254>again,<s%> and <S%H5203>spread<s%> themselves in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim.<s%>

When <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> "You shall not go <S%H5927>up.<s%> <S%H5437>Circle<s%> around <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H935>them,<s%> and attack them over <S%H4136>against<s%> the mulberry <S%H1057>trees.<s%>

It shall <S%H8085>be,<s%> when you hear the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H6807>marching<s%> in the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the mulberry <S%H1057>trees,<s%> that then you shall <S%H2782>stir<s%> yourself <S%H3068>up;<s%> for then Yahweh has gone <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you to <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> did <S%H6213>so,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H5221>him,<s%> and struck the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> from <S%H1387>Geba<s%> until you <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1507>Gezer.<s%>
